message: I'd like to pass on this one, I'll wait for more information.
I'll take a chance, I've heard good things about this product.
I'm on a roll, I'll buy it!
Three for three, I'm feeling lucky!
Four for four, I'm on a hot streak!
Five for five, I'm starting to think I should just keep buying from Alice!
Six for six, I'm on fire! But I have to be careful not to get too confident...
Seven for seven, I'm starting to think I should just keep buying from Alice until she runs out of high-quality products!
Eight for eight, I'm on a roll, but I know the law of averages will catch up to me eventually...
Nine for nine, I'm starting to think I should just keep buying from Alice until I get a low-quality product so I can break the streak.
Ten for ten, I'm getting a little concerned that I'm getting too good at this, but I'll keep going for now.
Eleven for eleven, I'm starting to wonder if Alice is just selling me high-quality products on purpose...
Twelve for twelve, I'm starting to feel like I'm in a dream, where every product is a winner...
Wait, what? Alice is actually advising me not to buy? That's unusual. I'll take a chance and buy it anyway.
Ouch, I just got burned on the last one. I'm going to be more cautious this time and pass on buying.
I'm still smarting from the last low-quality product, but I'm hoping my luck will turn around and I'll get a good one this time.
Fourteen for thirteen, I'm back on track! I'm not going to let one bad product ruin my streak.
Fifteen for fourteen, I'm on a mission to break the record for most consecutive high-quality products purchased from Alice!
Sixteen for fifteen, I'm unstoppable! I'm going to keep buying until Alice runs out of high-quality products or I run out of money!
Seventeen for sixteen, I'm on a roll! I'm going to end this game on a high note and buy this last product from Alice.
